document.full_text: north carolina guard dexter strickland stayed within inches of kentucky guard brandon knight all game, but was unable to keep the talented freshmen from scoring a game-high 22 points.
document.title: tar heel's gallant defense falls just short against wildcats
lines_and_colors: north carolina guard dexter strickland stayed within inches of kentucky guard brandon knight all game, but was unable to keep the talented freshmen from scoring a game-high 22 points.
